page.title: 09SKIPPING
page.content:
DRIP DROP Verse 1 - skip twice for this part.
Drip drop, drop us in the sea Please pull the rope for me. Come, come, come to the fair, No, no, the fair's not there This is the way the milkman calls: Your! Your!
Verse 2 - one skip for each word.
I must not miss a loop or I shall be out.
When the song is finished go through the alphabet. Skip once for each letter. Gradually gwt faster going through the alphabet. When the alphabet is finished go back to verse 1. If for some reason a person should stop she must take one end of the rope
